snippet: Tottenham Hotspur striker Harry Kane says he has silenced his doubters by winning the Premier League's Golden Boot this season....

headline.main: Kane Says Golden Boot Win Proves Critics Wrong
headline.print_headline: Kane Says Golden Boot Win Proves Critics Wrong

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur striker Harry Kane says he has silenced his doubters by winning the Premier League's Golden Boot this season.

snippet: Striker Emmanuel Adebayor said he hoped to realise his dream of featuring in the FA Cup final with Crystal Palace after failing to achieve the feat during his spells with Arsenal, Manchester City and Tottenham Hotspur....

headline.main: 'Beautiful' Palace Can Fulfil Adebayor's Wembley Dreams
headline.print_headline: 'Beautiful' Palace Can Fulfil Adebayor's Wembley Dreams

lead_paragraph: Striker Emmanuel Adebayor said he hoped to realise his dream of featuring in the FA Cup final with Crystal Palace after failing to achieve the feat during his spells with Arsenal, Manchester City and Tottenham Hotspur.

snippet: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic will meet club officials and owners following their 5-1 home drubbing by Arsenal, British media reported on Monday....

headline.main: West Ham Manager Bilic Set for Talks With Owners-Reports
headline.print_headline: West Ham Manager Bilic Set for Talks With Owners-Reports

lead_paragraph: West Ham United manager Slaven Bilic will meet club officials and owners following their 5-1 home drubbing by Arsenal, British media reported on Monday.

snippet: Midfielder Michail Antonio has extended his contract with West Ham United until 2020, the Premier League club said on Monday....

headline.main: Antonio Extends Contract With West Ham to 2020
headline.print_headline: Antonio Extends Contract With West Ham to 2020

lead_paragraph: Midfielder Michail Antonio has extended his contract with West Ham United until 2020, the Premier League club said on Monday.

snippet: Liverpool romped to an easy victory over Stoke City on Sunday despite manager Juergen Klopp resting a number of players ahead of Thursday's second leg of the Europa League quarter-final against his former club Borussia Dortmund....

headline.main: Understrength Liverpool Romp to Victory Over Stoke
headline.print_headline: Understrength Liverpool Romp to Victory Over Stoke

lead_paragraph: Liverpool romped to an easy victory over Stoke City on Sunday despite manager Juergen Klopp resting a number of players ahead of Thursday's second leg of the Europa League quarter-final against his former club Borussia Dortmund.

snippet: Norwich City have signed right back Ivo Pinto from Croatian side Dinamo Zagreb on a three-and-a-half year contract, the Premier League club said on Friday....

headline.main: Pinto Joins Norwich on Three-And-a-Half Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Pinto Joins Norwich on Three-And-a-Half Year Deal

lead_paragraph: Norwich City have signed right back Ivo Pinto from Croatian side Dinamo Zagreb on a three-and-a-half year contract, the Premier League club said on Friday.

snippet: West Ham United will bring in a series of safety measures to avoid a repeat of crowd trouble at their new home, after supporters clashed in their Premier League game against Watford earlier this month....

headline.main: West Ham Set to Bring in Safety Measures After Crowd Trouble
headline.print_headline: West Ham Set to Bring in Safety Measures After Crowd Trouble

lead_paragraph: West Ham United will bring in a series of safety measures to avoid a repeat of crowd trouble at their new home, after supporters clashed in their Premier League game against Watford earlier this month.

snippet: Polish goalkeeper Artur Boruc has signed a one-year contract extension with Bournemouth that will keep him at Dean Court until June 2017, the Premier League club announced on Friday....

headline.main: Boruc Signs One-Year Extension With Bournemouth
headline.print_headline: Boruc Signs One-Year Extension With Bournemouth

lead_paragraph: Polish goalkeeper Artur Boruc has signed a one-year contract extension with Bournemouth that will keep him at Dean Court until June 2017, the Premier League club announced on Friday.

snippet: Midfielder Sebastian Larsson has told his Sunderland team that it must hold its nerve to avoid relegation....

headline.main: Sunderland Must Hold Their Nerve to Avoid Relegation, Says Larsson
headline.print_headline: Sunderland Must Hold Their Nerve to Avoid Relegation, Says Larsson

lead_paragraph: Midfielder Sebastian Larsson has told his Sunderland team that it must hold its nerve to avoid relegation.

snippet: Senegal's Papiss Cisse has joined Chinese Super League side Shandong Luneng, his relegated English club Newcastle United said on Saturday....

headline.main: Senegal Striker Cisse Joins China's Shandong Luneng
headline.print_headline: Senegal Striker Cisse Joins China's Shandong Luneng

lead_paragraph: Senegal's Papiss Cisse has joined Chinese Super League side Shandong Luneng, his relegated English club Newcastle United said on Saturday.
